description.value: Your summoned creature appears in a detonation of arcane runes. If your next action is to Cast a Spell with the summon trait, all creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] around the creature you summoned take @Damage[1d4[fire]] damage per spell rank. If the creature summoned has the acid, cold, electricity, sonic, or spirit trait, you can deal damage of that type instead.
